Question.Subject: Why won't Peggle online work on my computer?
Question.Content: Last Saturday, Popcap's version of Peggle stopped working. It hasn't worked since. Help?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Two possible reasons:
1. Are you running a new firewall or port blocker like Peer Guardian or Peer Blocker? I know I can't run MapleStory with Peer Blocker running.
2. Did you recently update Flash? I've had a few older Flash based games bookmarked that don't work anymore with newer versions of Flash.
Hope that helps!
